content: At the top of the stairs where all the mages were positioned, there's actually not too much to find here. Several Monk Supporters patrol the building exterior, where you can also find a few Overseeing Monks training along the corners.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
At the top of the stairs where all the mages were positioned, there's actually not too much to find here. Several Monk Supporters patrol the building exterior, where you can also find a few Overseeing Monks training along the corners.
